idea

lab

Hardware Lab

noun; a space for innovators which provides hardware, software and an environment built to promote the creation of technology.

The Department of Computer Science at the University of Arizona has teamed up with the student-led Hack Arizona organization to create an initiative that provides resources for students from all majors and backgrounds to build their ideas
